apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person in a tuxedo emoji showcases a distinguished individual with a dark skin tone, impeccably dressed in a classic black tuxedo with a crisp white shirt and bow tie. Apple's detailed rendering imbues the attire with a subtle sheen and realistic fabric texture, enhanced by its signature glossy 3D shading. This emoji elegantly signifies formal occasions, celebrations, special events, or a touch of sophistication and dapper charm in messages sent from Apple devices.
